content: a very easy pattern this sweet little pullover sweater is knitted in one piece with just 2 short side and sleeve seams to join requires - dk 8ply yarn 4mm needles 22sts = 4 10cm for a simple sweater - knit in one colour for more interest - add stripes or bands of colour if desired a cute little unisex design now available in 5 sizes ~ 9 - 12 months 6 months 3months newborn small/early baby large premature **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
